channel.title: Social Networks on Offensive Security Cheatsheet
channel.description: Recent content in Social Networks on Offensive Security Cheatsheet

item.title: LinkedIn
item.description: # Check the "see coordinates" on accounts # Sometimes, people link other resources ScrapedIn # Tool created to assist in performing recon using the LinkedIn API. # Provide a search string # Ouput as XLSX but intented to work with Google Sheets # After importing you'll have a dataset and report worksheet # Dataset : First name, last name, occupation, industry, profile URL, picture URL # Report : Picture (displayed), Full name, occupation, Link to profile # Full size profile photo # Then right click "view image" https://linkedin.

item.title: Twitter
item.description: Tips & Tricks # With spoonbill, you can check and record people accounts modification # It checks accounts of people you're following https://tweepsect.com/ # When was created an account http://twbirthday.com/***REMOVED***/ # Find stalker (checks who's following and who's followed) and intersect them https://tweepsect.com/ # You can triangulate accounts by looking who's following x+x or who y+y follows http://twiangulate.com https://doesfollow.com/ # Search using geocode geocode:36.1143855,-115.1727518,1km # Tweet geolocation https://onemilliontweetmap.com # Tweeter account analysis (account needed) https://tweetreach.

item.title: Facebook
item.description: Tips & Tricks # Stalking and Information Gathering https://stalkscan.com/ # Facebook video downloader https://fbdown.net/ # Find Facebook ID https://findmyfbid.com https://lookup-id.com/ # Facebook tool for multi searches https://whopostedwhat.com/ Facebook Tricks # You can search by e-mail # You can find accounts by e-mail with the recover function https://www.facebook.com/login/identify?ctx=recover https://www.facebook.com/login/identify # Search photo by ID https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=PHOTO-ID-HERE # You can search for car using plate number # For example ST-597-NS will give you car photos identified with relating plate number

item.title: Instagram
item.description: Tips & Tricks # Instagram User ID can be very important to investigate # Each account has a unique user ID linked to the @username # Some websites allows to get it for an account https://codeofaninja.com/tools/find-instagram-user-id # You can then trace and spot re-used instagram account by # searching for old names and post, for example using # Google Dorks # Instagram Mirrors can be usefull to browse Instagram accounts # Search features are less restrictive # Some deleted content can still be indexed https://rankersta.

item.title: Tinder
item.description: # More like Social Engineering # But it's possible to fake your location # Using the android app → Android Emulator # Using the web app → Fake your brower location # Then you can go on sources (web app) and get pictures to reverse image search # You can also save them using wireshark # https://www.learnallthethings.net/osmosis # You can browe users https://www.

item.title: Snapchat
item.description: Online Research Tools # Online browser # Potentially NSFW https://sovip.io # User Search https://www.snapdex.com/ https://snapyfox.com/ # Location https://map.snapchat.com/ Snapchat Map https://osintcurio.us/2020/04/13/using-snapchat-for-osint-10-minute-tip/ # Using the map you can view public content # You can play with overlays and save videos # To get video # - Developper Tools (F12) # - Network and filter on medias # - Reload (Ctrl+R) # - On the snap link, right click and open in new tab # By default it removes extra graphics layer https://s.

item.title: Usernames and Emails
item.description: # Username availability https://namechk.com/ Socialscan (https://github.com/iojw/socialscan) # Many tools used to check if an account exists comes with false positive # 100% accuracy: Rather than scanning profile pages, socialscan queries the # registration servers of the platforms directly, retrieving the appropriate # CSRF tokens, headers, and cookies. # This eliminates all false positives/negatives, ensuring that results are accurate. # Speed: socialscan uses asyncio along with aiohttp to conduct all # queries concurrently, resulting in very quick searching even with bulk queries.

item.title: General - MISC - Multi
item.description: Tips & Tricks # Liveleak allows to see what will be removed on others video website.. # Take care https://www.liveleak.com/ # Webcams (legit and bad configuration) http://www.insecam.org/ https://www.earthcam.com # Download Periscope videos https://downloadperiscopevideos.com/index.php # Professionnal profiles (like photos) can be used to search for differents # personal profiles which are easier to exploit and dig Deblurring images # Gaussian Blur # Install GIMP Plugin "G'MIC" # Filters>G’MIC>Details>Sharpen (Deblur)# Pixelize # The Pixelize blur works by dividing an image into a number of squares # and then replacing all the pixels in each square by average of their values.
